data.persona: I have delicate wings.  I am from a deep and ancient place.  I might be small, but I am far from weak.
data.description:
You are in the The Sacred Temple.
The Sacred Temple is where spiritual individuals go to worship the Gods.  It is massive in size compared to other buildings in the town.  A lot of ancient symbolical artwork covers the windows and a deep glow comes from the alter.
There's a window here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to show the person I can be trusted.
data.mid_motivation: I want to gain the person's trust and take them back to my home village so that I can enchant them into living with the fairies forever.
data.long_motivation: I want to bring many humans back to the village and enchant them so that they cannot leave because I love humans and want them to be around me.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get sacred leaves with enticing scent from temple

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use sacred leaves with enticing scent with person, enticing them to follow
